name: Goddess Bow
effectText: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Warrior monster. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, negate the first effect activated by your opponent during each Battle Phase, also, after that, the equipped monster can make a second attack during this Battle Phase.
